function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of self-reported health ratings as opposed to objective health measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of self-reported knowledge and perceptions without objective validation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Measuring public attention and trust in official media related to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of embracement of protective behaviors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Association of sociodemographic characteristics with public knowledge and protective behaviors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Media reports can fuel fear related to contagious diseases like covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent or untrustworthy government communication may lead to public frustration and non-acceptance of advice during a health crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Elevated fear and anxiety leading to mental health problems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased engagement in protective behaviors due to negative emotional response","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Biased risk perception due to uncertainty about covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited understanding of the new disease covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Influence of social and cultural perspectives on risk perception","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of knowledge about covid-19 symptoms and transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Downplaying the risk of contagious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Incorrect risk perception leading to lack of preventative actions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of understanding as a major obstacle to public compliance with emergency response measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in human behavior occur in three stages: knowledge acquisition, belief generation, and behavior formation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of appropriate knowledge as a prerequisite for the public to take action","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bias in data collection due to online survey","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete questionnaire submissions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Logic errors in returned questionnaires","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variability in governmental policies and public behaviors","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to protective behaviors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Quarantine and isolation measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited attention to public responses to the government’s actions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dearth of literature documenting public protective behaviors in china","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Late endorsement of face mask usage in the us and some european countries","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate adoption of preventive measures such as social distancing, hand hygiene, and wearing face masks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Debate over the effectiveness of wearing masks by the public","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Differing interpretations of the importance of preventive measures based on social and cultural context","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Circulation of contagious diseases due to large public events","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Healthcare leadership and capacity under strain","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic and social impact on society","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for food products leading to panic buying","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of restaurants and cafes leading to job losses and risk of permanent closure","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased domestic violence due to lockdown measures","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Panic-buying and stockpiling of food products","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased demand for food products","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient distribution and delivery of food products","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Person-to-person transmission due to overcrowded hospitals","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of ventilators and medical supplies","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay in real estate transactions due to lockdown may impact confidence and lead to a financial crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cancellation and postponement of sports events to curb disease spread leading to financial burden","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High demand to develop a covid-19 vaccine leading to intense competition and pressure","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suspension of international travel","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Redundancy and unpaid leave for
